name: coconut.keyboard
description: Single keyboard handler for html5 game development.

scripts.test: node test.js | tap-dot && npm run test-html
scripts.test-html: rm test/bundle.js && browserify test.js -o test/bundle.js && echo 'open ./test/index.html in web browser'

author: Emil Johansson <emiljohansson.se@gmail.com> (emiljohansson.se)
